headline: Wells Fargo Increases PT on Albemarle Corporation (ALB) from $60 to $75; Maintains ‘Equal Weight’ Rating
summary: Due to strong hedge fund interest, Albemarle Corporation (NYSE:ALB) is among the 11 Best Mineral Stocks to Buy According to Hedge Funds. On July 14, 2025, Wells Fargo increased its price target on Albemarle Corporation (NYSE:ALB) from $60 to $75, maintaining an ‘Equal Weight’ rating. headline: 5 Biggest Critical Mineral Mines in North America
summary: China’s dominance persists but faces growing Western pushback, with the U.S. and allies investing heavily in local mining, processing, and supply chains

headline: Earnings Preview: Air Products and Chemicals (APD) Q3 Earnings Expected to Decline
summary: Air Products and Chemicals (APD) doesn't possess the right combination of the two key ingredients for a likely earnings beat in its upcoming report. Get prepared with the key expectations.

headline: Telescope Innovations Selected to Join ALTA: the First US-Based Lithium Technology Accelerator
summary: Telescope is among the first tech companies invited to the Arkansas Lithium Technology Accelerator (ALTA), engaging with industry leaders on the commercialization pathways for its lithium processing technologies Vancouver, British Columbia--(Newsfile Corp. - July 24, 2025) - Telescope Innovations Corp.
